title: UK's Conservatives name Kemi Badenoch as new leader, shifting the party further to the right
content: The U.K.'s opposition Conservative Party on Saturday named its new leader, following a long-drawn-out runoff after the Tories' landslide electoral defeat marked a moment of reckoning.
summary: The U.K.'s opposition Conservative Party on Saturday named its new leader, following a long-drawn-out runoff after the Tories' landslide electoral defeat marked a moment of reckoning.

title: The next U.S. president could inherit a booming economy. That's a daunting challenge.
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and Donald Trump both made the economy a focus of their campaign platforms since voters rank it a top priority.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and Donald Trump both made the economy a focus of their campaign platforms since voters rank it a top priority.

title: Berkshire Hathaway's cash fortress tops $300 billion as Buffett sells more stock, freezes buybacks
content: The Omaha-based conglomerate saw its cash fortress swell to a record $325.2 billion by the end of September.
summary: The Omaha-based conglomerate saw its cash fortress swell to a record $325.2 billion by the end of September.

title: Surge in UK borrowing costs is not a repeat of the 'mini-budget' crisis, economists say
content: "It isn't anything like we saw with the Trussonomics mini-budget when that spike really was high after those unfunded tax cuts came in," one analyst said.
summary: "It isn't anything like we saw with the Trussonomics mini-budget when that spike really was high after those unfunded tax cuts came in," one analyst said.

title: Warren Buffett continued to sell down his Apple stake, cutting about a quarter in the third period
content: The Oracle of Omaha downsized Apple — his biggest equity holding — for a fourth quarter in a row.
summary: The Oracle of Omaha downsized Apple — his biggest equity holding — for a fourth quarter in a row.

title: Google's cloud outpaces rivals in third quarter as AI battle heats up
content: One takeaway from tech earnings reports this week is that Google's cloud business is gaining momentum.
summary: One takeaway from tech earnings reports this week is that Google's cloud business is gaining momentum.

title: Nvidia to join Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing rival chipmaker Intel
content: Nvidia is replacing Intel in the Dow Jones Industrial Average, a shakeup that reflects a massive change in the semiconductor industry.
summary: Nvidia is replacing Intel in the Dow Jones Industrial Average, a shakeup that reflects a massive change in the semiconductor industry.

title: Google employees pressure costumed execs at all-hands meeting for clarity on cost cuts
content: Following comments on Google's earnings call about continuing cuts, employees wanted answers at the company's latest all-hands meeting.
summary: Following comments on Google's earnings call about continuing cuts, employees wanted answers at the company's latest all-hands meeting.

title: This European island is likened to the Maldives. I stayed for a week – for $1,500
content: Sardinia has white beaches, turquoise sea and plenty of watersports, rather like the Maldives. And it's possible to travel inexpensively there too.
summary: Sardinia has white beaches, turquoise sea and plenty of watersports, rather like the Maldives. And it's possible to travel inexpensively there too.

title: Record numbers of wealthy Americans are making plans to leave the U.S. after the election
content: Attorneys and advisors to family offices and high-net-worth families said they're seeing record demand from clients looking for second passports or long-term residencies abroad.
summary: Attorneys and advisors to family offices and high-net-worth families said they're seeing record demand from clients looking for second passports or long-term residencies abroad.

title: Super Micro's 45% plunge this week wipes out stock's gains for the year
content: Super Micro investors have been fleeing for the exits this week after the company lost its second auditor in less than two years.
summary: Super Micro investors have been fleeing for the exits this week after the company lost its second auditor in less than two years.

title: 10-year Treasury yield rises above 4.3% as traders ignore noisy jobs report
content: The 10-year Treasury yield rose higher Friday. The October jobs report showed muted job growth in a month that included hurricanes and a major strike.
summary: The 10-year Treasury yield rose higher Friday. The October jobs report showed muted job growth in a month that included hurricanes and a major strike.

title: U.S. economy added just 12,000 jobs in October, impacted by hurricanes, Boeing strike
content: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 100,000 in October, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.
summary: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 100,000 in October, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

title: China's Zeekr reports EV deliveries in October nearly doubled, clocks its best monthly numbers
content: Several major Chinese electric car companies are yet to release deliveries data for October.
summary: Several major Chinese electric car companies are yet to release deliveries data for October.

title: Bank of Japan likely to stay course with a rate hike in December or January, analysts say
content: Stefan Angrick, associate director and senior economist at Moody's Analytics, described the tone of the BOJ's Outlook Report as being "moderately" hawkish.
summary: Stefan Angrick, associate director and senior economist at Moody's Analytics, described the tone of the BOJ's Outlook Report as being "moderately" hawkish.

title: Federal Reserve rate cuts could prove to be a boon for Southeast Asian economies
content: The central banks of both Indonesia and Thailand are attempting to maneuver themselves in the aftermath of the recent Fed cut.
summary: The central banks of both Indonesia and Thailand are attempting to maneuver themselves in the aftermath of the recent Fed cut.

title: 25-year-old spent $300 on a sewing machine in high school—now her seven-figure denim brand is worn by Taylor Swift

title: Higher taxes will make it harder for Britain to build 'the next Nvidia,' tech execs say
content: Startup founders and investors slammed capital gains tax hikes in the U.K., saying it would make it harder for the country to succeed as a global tech hub.

title: Chevron beats earnings expectations, returns more than $7 billion to shareholders
content: Chevron's stock is largely flat for the year, underperforming the S&P 500 energy sector which has gained more than 6%.
summary: Chevron's stock is largely flat for the year, underperforming the S&P 500 energy sector which has gained more than 6%.

title: 33-year-old who left the U.S. to live minutes from the ocean in Jamaica: 'I feel like I have a better chance of longevity here'
content: Having moved to Jamaica from North Carolina, "my stress has lifted and I am so much healthier," says "Money Talk with Tiff" podcast host and mom Tiffany Grant.
summary: Having moved to Jamaica from North Carolina, "my stress has lifted and I am so much healthier," says "Money Talk with Tiff" podcast host and mom Tiffany Grant.

title: Manchester United appoint Ruben Amorim as manager after sacking Erik ten Hag
content: English soccer giants Manchester United on Friday confirmed the appointment of Ruben Amorim as their new manager, shortly after sacking Erik ten Hag.

title: China’s manufacturing output swings back into expansion in October, private survey finds
content: The Caixin/S&P Global manufacturing PMI came in at 50.3 in October, beating the median estimate of 49.7 in a Reuters poll.
summary: The Caixin/S&P Global manufacturing PMI came in at 50.3 in October, beating the median estimate of 49.7 in a Reuters poll.

title: ASEAN continues to emerge as a winner of U.S.-China trade tensions, IMF says
content: Southeast Asia has continued to emerge as an economic winner of increasing geopolitical tensions between China and the United States, according to the IMF.
summary: Southeast Asia has continued to emerge as an economic winner of increasing geopolitical tensions between China and the United States, according to the IMF.

title: 'Silver economy' boom: China transforms kindergartens into senior care homes as demographic crisis deepens
content: The falling birth rates and aging population propelled businesses that used to cater to children to shift to serving a different but more abundant set of customers, the elderly.

title: Chinese EV maker BYD's quarterly sales overtook Tesla's for the first time
content: The milestone comes amid tough competition in China, the world's largest auto market, as well as higher tariffs on imports of Chinese EVs into the EU.
